item.title: Kubernetes (1.7) commands cheatsheet.
item.description: Version: 1.6 Get info kubectl get pods -o wide kubectl describe svc <SERVICE-NAME> Delete all pods with a label kubectl delete pods -l label=value Set namespace for kubectl console session kubectl config set-context --current -n=<NAMESPACE> Validate deployment before actually applying it kubectl apply --dry-run=client -f deployment.yaml Deploy a service and watch process kubectl apply -f deployment.yaml kubectl get service <SERVICE-NAME> [--watch] Bash into k8s existing pod kubectl exec -it <POD-NAME> -- /bin/bash Deploy the most basic disposable pod and bash into it, to access the network.
